title: Kaffestugan Torpet
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Bakery, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers at least one vegan menu choice; please inquire about other items that may be vegan or can be made vegan. Uses fair trade and eco-friendly products. Both indoor and outdoor seating. On cold days, a fire is lit in the cottage stove. An alternative, countryside style cafe in an old, traditional small Swedish homestead, surrounded by forests, allotment gardens and two lakes, located 2.5 kilometers south of the Stockholm suburb Skarpnack. Bus 180 from subway stations Karrtorp (17 minutes) or Skarpnack (bus stop Skarpnacks alle) opposite the subway exit; 7 minutes) has its end stop (Orhem) right outside the cafe. The walk from subway station Skarpnack takes around 30 minutes.
